content.newsItem1: The new spring menu will be available soon, bringing a new gourmet experience!
content.newsItem2: JIA Izakaya's third anniversary, 15% off on all meals!
content.newsItem3: Every Wednesday Ladies Night, female customers enjoy special discounts!
content.newsItem4: Join us for a special Sake Tasting event this Saturday with limited edition sake varieties!
content.newsItem5: Experience a seasonal omakase menu curated by our chef for one week only!
content.newsItem6: Celebrate Golden Week with us and enjoy 10% off all dishes!
content.newsItem7: Bring your dad for a special dinner and enjoy a complimentary sake sampler on Father's Day!
content.newsItem8: Join us every weekday from 5-7 PM for half-price drinks during Happy Hour!
content.newsItem9: Celebrate the season with our Summer Matsuri Feast, featuring special dishes and live entertainment!
content.newsItem10: Every Friday night is Karaoke Night! Sing your favorite songs and enjoy exclusive drink specials!
